lab4Source
Class AbstractShape

java.lang.Object
  lab4Source.AbstractShape
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractSquare, Circle, Rectangle, Triangle
public abstract class AbstractShape
extends java.lang.Object

The abstract super class to the shapes. Holds information about placement, size and family.
